    • Uses of InternalWindow in GUI

      Subclasses of InternalWindow in GUI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  InternalWindowCamera
      That class will create a internal window that will show our webcam.
      class  InternalWindowImage
      That class will create a internal window that will show an image.

      That class will create a internal window that will show our video.
      class  InternalWindowRecord
      That class will create a internal window that will let us record a sound.

      That class will create a internal window that will play and sound.
